EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #3.2019 Dealer Update #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales & NEXT Bulletins Update - December 3, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | December 2018
Trade-in Credit for Data Loader Upgrade
- Upgrading to the DL-1000 with wireless capability offers easy loading of databases via a user-friendly mobile application. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-08 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-08 DL-1000 Wireless Capable Data Loader.pdf]]>. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_06 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_06 DL-1000 Wireless Data Loader.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
SmartRunway/SmartLanding for Business Aircraft
- This sales bulletin provides 2019 pricing and product information for SmartRunway/SmartLanding. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-09 SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_05 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_05 SmartRunway SmartLanding and RAAS for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Exchange Program for the Textron Sovereign
- Special pricing and reduced aircraft downtime for Textron Sovereign operators. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_01 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_01%20ADS-B Out Upgrade for Primus Epic Equipped Textron Sovereign.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 NEXT bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
ADS-B Out Promotional Program for Business Aircraft with Primus II Radios
- Multiple upgrade paths are available to meet the 2020 mandate. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_02 ADS-B Primus II Upgrade Program.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 NEXT bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
FANS 1/A+ Operation Upgrade
- Act now for the upcoming mandate! - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_03 FANS 1A Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 NEXT bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
FMS 6.1 Software Upgrade
- Upgrade to FMS 6.1 to take advantage of new features and sustainable support. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_04 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_04%20FMS 6-1 Software Upgrade.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 NEXT bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
